categories: Category:Imperial Navy pilots of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Colonel Jendon was a former test pilot who flew various TIE prototypes, and was the first pilot to fly a TIE Defender. He was a member of Onyx Squadron as Onyx 1 alongside Captain Yorr, and was the copilot of Darth Vader's personal shuttle in the months before the Battle of Endor. In 4 ABY Jendon and Yorr brought Vader to Death Star II.
Jendon appeared in Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi, where he was portrayed by actor Mike Havord.
